players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was a villager, so the mafia is either Bob or Alice. I suspect Bob."
You: "I investigated Bob, he's mafia. He knows I'm detective. Vote him."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob, you know I'm detective, but I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote me or vote Bob? Vote Bob."
Bob: "Alice, you can't be detective because you didn't investigate anyone else. I know you are mafia."
Diana: "Alice, you say you investigated Bob, but Bob says you didn't investigate anyone. That contradiction makes me think Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was a villager, so the mafia is either Bob or Alice. I suspect Bob."
Alice: "I investigated Bob, he's mafia. He knows I'm detective. Vote him."
You: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob, you know I'm detective, but I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote me or vote Bob? Vote Bob."
You: "Alice, you can't be detective because you didn't investigate anyone else. I know you are mafia."
Diana: "Alice, you say you investigated Bob, but Bob says you didn't investigate anyone. That contradiction makes me think Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
